mapper.insert: insert into member(user_seq, user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_addr3, user_dt, adminck) VALUES(0, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_email}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2}, #{user_addr3}, sysdate(), 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from member where user_email = #{user_email}
select user_id, user_pw, adminck from member where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select user_seq, user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_addr2, user_dt from member order by user_seq
select user_id, user_addr1,user_addr2,user_addr3,user_email, user_dt from member where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id from member where user_email = #{user_email}
